name: Crank Hero
description:
THIS IS MY FIRST VIDEOGAME FOR PLAYDATE! HOPE YOU LIKE IT!

Use the crank to increase/decrease the size of the stick in order to reach the next platform. Be careful! The moment you stop cranking, the stick falls! If the stick is not long enough, you will fall down!

THEME: Crank It Till You Make It

You will need to crank till you make the stick of the desired length.

This is just a demo, I will update the game later with my own spin on the idea by adding coins, monsters, etc.

ATTENTION SIMULATOR USERS:

  • I recommend using the slider to control the crank and clicking on the "docked" checkbox to stop cranking:

ATTENTION PLAYDATE USERS:

  • Please report if you're facing any performance issues

ASSETS USED:

Hobbit by oisougabo.

DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS:

You need an actual playdate console or the playdate simulator at https://play.date/dev/. 

Once you have that follow the next steps...

Download the "zip file" below and extract the "pdx folder". Then run the game in the playdate simulator/console.

PLEASE LOAD THE "CRANK HERO.PDX" FOLDER inside the "CRANK HERO" FOLDER once you extract it from the zip file.
